title: 253B-Monkey King: The Good Guys
itunes:title: 253B-Monkey King: The Good Guys
description:
Monkey has been fired. Sandy has been captured. Pigsy is fleeing in terror, and the monk is about to be cut to pieces by a room full of angry guys. Things are not going well.

The creature is a buff angry dude whose solution to everything is hitting it with a spiky club.

--
